newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT - Interneuron Pharmaceuticals raised.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - Interneuron Pharmaceuticals raised.

text.p: -- Vector Securities International said it raised its rating on Interneuron Pharmaceuticals Inc to "focus buy" from buy.

-- In a November 18 release, analyst Michael King said Interneuron is fundamentally sound, with about $172 million in cash at the end of last quarter. He called the company's product pipeline "formidable" and its Redux prescription product launch "exceptional."
-- He would be an aggressive buyer at current levels, with a one-year price target of $50 based on a 35 multiple of fiscal year 2000 earnings-per-share estimate of $4.43.
-- Interneuron shares on Tuesday were unchanged at 21.
